comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: P-47C serial 41-6306 never left the States, serving with a variety of training units during the war. At the time of the photo, it could have been undergoing cold weather testing at Ladd Field, AK. Eventually, she was declared surplus and turned over to the Reconstruction Finance Corp. at Albuquerque, NM on 18 June 1945.
